::DarkMouse::

She sniffed the air again.  It was the rat from earlier.  She stayed 
hiddedn behind the tree with her gun drawn.  She was holding her pet 
rat in her free hand against her body.  SHe stayed perfectly still.  

The rat, on the other hand, was moving.  It crawled free and started 
to climb up her arm.  It kept crawling up until it reached her 
shoulder.  Is snuggled next to her neck and stayed there.

She smirked and whispered, "What ever you do, don't sneeze."  she 
chuckled quietly to herself.  She thought, how can one fight with a 
rat perched on one's shoulders?  She was hoping she really wouldn't 
find out, but knew that avoiding this would be extremely difficult.
